title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classSet is not returning the expected class
description: Bug 49235: When calling the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup() method with a Set<Class<?>> classSet, the output is 'MySomeAnn'. However, the expected output is 'MySomeClass'. This issue seems to be related to the Servlet 3.0 specification. It's worth noting that the code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
OB: When calling the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup() method with a Set<Class<?>> classSet, the output 'MySomeAnn' is printed.
EB: I expect the output to be 'MySomeClass'.
